name: Catch The Fly (Noam18)
description:
Thanks for ZahranW, ManuGamesDev and KingW for hosting this jam.

It was a fun expiriance for creating my first game for my first game jam, and because this is my first game, it's not very polished.

Catch The Fly is a game where you play as a frog who's jumping from log to log to try and catch a big fly, press Space to jump and avoid falling to the water down.
